headline: PNC's Demchak vows to bring the fight from coast to coast
summary: "We're coming into your market," PNC Chief Executive Bill Demchack said Friday. "If you're not coming into our market to come fight us, we're coming to your market to come fight you, and we're going to get some percentage of your market."

headline: Ford & BYD reportedly in talks to partner, PNC rises on earnings
summary: Morning Brief host Julie Hyman takes a look at some of Friday morning's trending tickers and stories. PNC Financial (PNC) stock is rising on the company's fourth quarter earnings results. BYD (BYD) stock is jumping on reports that the electric vehicle (EV)–maker is in talks to partner with Ford (F). ImmunityBio (IBRX) stock is skyrocketing, already doubling so far this year. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: PNC Financial Services Group (NYSE:PNC) Exceeds Q4 CY2025 Expectations
summary: Financial services giant PNC (NYSE:PNC) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.5% year on year to $6.07 billion. Its GAAP profit of $4.88 per share was 15.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: The Bull Case For PNC (PNC) Could Change Following Early Debt Redemption And Dividend Decisions
summary: In early January 2026, PNC Financial Services Group moved to redeem a combined US$3.00 billion of senior notes ahead of their original 2027 maturities, while also affirming its US$1.70 per-share common dividend and declaring multiple preferred dividends. Alongside these capital moves, PNC filed a US$44.95 million employee stock plan shelf registration and reinforced its office-based workforce model, underscoring how it is reshaping both its balance sheet and operating footprint as...
